hymn.title: But unto you who fear My name

layout.singingstanza: But un -- to you who fear My name will the Sun of right -- eous -- ness a -- rise with heal -- ing in His wings, with heal -- ing in His wings, and you will go forth and leap a -- bout like well -- fed calves, and you will go forth and leap a -- bout like well -- fed calves. But un -- to you who fear My name will the Sun of right -- eous -- ness a -- rise with heal -- ing in His wings, with heal -- ing in His wings.

lyrics.stanza: But unto you who fear My name Will the Sun of righteousness arise With healing in His wings, With healing in His wings.
And you will go forth and leap about like well-fed calves, And you will go forth and leap about like well-fed calves.
But unto you who fear My name Will the Sun of righteousness arise With healing in His wings, With healing in His wings.
